categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic fleets

nodes.text: Under the command of Admiral Gial Ackbar, a fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic was active during the Galactic Civil War following the destruction of Alderaan. The flagship of the fleet was the MC80 Liberty Type Heavy Star Cruiser Aurora, which was supported by at least nine CR90 corvettes, seven EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigates, and five GR-75 medium transports, as well as Echo Squadron.
